mapper.sql: SID, MILL_SHEET_NO, SECURITY_CODE, EN_CHECK_NUM, EN_CHECK_NUM_MAX, CO_CHECK_NUM, CO_CHECK_NUM_MAX, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM WARRANTY.MILL_SECURITY_INFO A INNER JOIN WARRANTY.MILL_SHEET_HOSTS B ON A.MILL_SHEET_NO = B.MILL_SHEET_NO where A.MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SECURITY_CODE = #{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.STATE IN ('EXAMINED', 'DOWNLOADED', 'PRIVIEWED', 'PRINTED')
mapper.insert:
insert into MILL_SECURITY_INFO
SID,
MILL_SHEET_NO,
SECURITY_CODE,
EN_CHECK_NUM,
EN_CHECK_NUM_MAX,
CO_CHECK_NUM,
CO_CHECK_NUM_MAX,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_DT,
UPDATED_BY,
UPDATED_DT,
VERSION,
#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{enCheckNumMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{coCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{coCheckNumMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update MILL_SECURITY_INFO set version = version + 1,
MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECURITY_CODE = #{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EN_CHECK_NUM = #{enCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EN_CHECK_NUM_MAX = #{enCheckNumMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_CHECK_NUM = #{coCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_CHECK_NUM_MAX = #{coCheckNumMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECK_NUM = #{checkNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECK_NUM_MAX = #{checkNumMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SECURITY_CODE = #{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update MILL_SECURITY_INFO set MILL_SHEET_NO = #{millSheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_CODE = #{securityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EN_CHECK_NUM = #{enCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EN_CHECK_NUM_MAX = #{enCheckNumMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_CHECK_NUM = #{coCheckNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_CHECK_NUM_MAX = #{coCheckNumMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
